page.shortlink: api client api string tocase method

argument.name: case
argument.description: The case to return the string in.

return.name: value
return.description: The value of the string in the passed in case.

page.description: Extension to the native string variable to convert a string into a given case.

discussion.p: The String.toCase method will convert a string into a number of optional cases. These are:
"sentence" or "s" to convert to sentence-case (the first letter of the first word in a sentence is upper-case the rest are lower).
"title", "t" to convert to title-case (the first letter of each word is upper-case).
